properties.name: footer-align
properties.description: Alignment of footer contents to right or left.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Mode to open, alert or dialogue mode.

properties.name: primary-action-label
properties.description: Label to be displayed for primary action.

properties.name: secondary-action-label
properties.description: Label to be displayed for secondary action.

events.name: actionStatus
events.description: Fire when click on yes or no button
